text: Al-Qasim Sport Club () is an Iraqi football team based in Al-Qasim City, Babil, that plays in Iraqi Premier League. ==History== Al-Qasim Club was founded in 1973 by a group of young athletes. The team have been in the Iraq Division One for many years and have not been able to qualify for the Premier League due to lack of financial support and lack of a good stadium. In the 2015–16 season, the team strengthened their ranks with good players and was about to qualify for the Premier League, but finished second behind Al-Bahri in Elite Stage, and Al-Bahri qualified. As well as in the 2017–18 season, but they finished second behind Erbil in Final stage, and Erbil qualified. Al- Qasim managed to win the 2018–19 Iraq Division One and qualify for the 2019–20 Iraqi Premier League for first time, and chose Al Kifl Stadium to have them a playground for their Premier League matches. Al-Qasim won the 2018–19 Iraq Division One title after defeating Zakho in the final penalty shootout 4–1, after the match with a draw in the full time. ==Current squad== ===First-team squad=== ==Current technical staff== {| class="toccolours" !bgcolor=silver|Position !bgcolor=silver|Name !bgcolor=silver|Nationality |- bgcolor=#eeeeee |Manager:||Jassim Jaber|| |- |Assistant manager:||Kadhim Nasser|| |- bgcolor=#eeeeee |Assistant manager:||Qasim Jaloot|| |- |Assistant manager:||Chasib Sultan|| |- bgcolor=#eeeeee |Assistant manager:||Falah Hassan|| |-bgcolor=#eeeeee |Goalkeeping coach:||Safaa Kadhim|| |- | Fitness coach:||Mustafa Jassim|| |-bgcolor=#eeeeee | Director of football:||Rasoul Jassim|| |- | Administrative director:||Naim Raheem|| |- bgcolor=#eeeeee | Administrative director:||Ali Dhaher|| |- | Club doctor:||Abbas Sami|| |-bgcolor=#eeeeee | Club doctor:||Baqer Mohammed|| |- ==Managers== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Name !rowspan="2"|From !rowspan="2"|To !colspan="5"|Record |- !G!!W!!D!!L!!Win % |- |align=left| Jassim Jaber |align=left|1 May 2018 |align=left|9 October 2019 |- |align=left| Hussam Fawzi |align=left|9 October 2019 |align=left|4 July 2020 |- |align=left| Jassim Jaber |align=left|4 July 2020 |align=left|Present |- |} ==Kit suppliers== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !
